description:
Just a month into President Donald Trump’s chaotic administration, American and international conservatives swooped into the 2025 Conservative Political Action Conference (CPAC) outside Washington, D.C., in mid-February, and took a knee to the president, non-elected billionaire Elon Musk, and their fossil fuel deregulation agenda.  After numerous speeches heralding the MAGA movement by major figures on […]

The post Trump at CPAC 2025: Attack Climate Policy and Double Down on Denial appeared first on DeSmog.
title: Trump at CPAC 2025: Attack Climate Policy and  Double Down on Denial
